subject: [sugar] Example of journal integration
body:
Hello,

I put together a simple example of activity - journal integration. It's 
just a simple text editor which saves and load from the journal.

You can get it from this git repository:
http://dev.laptop.org/~marco/edit-activity

Feedback and questions are welcome.

Marco
_______________________________________________
Sugar mailing list
Sugar@lists.laptop.org
http://lists.laptop.org/listinfo/sugar
